name: Dino Dash (chrygore)
description:
This is a game where you run around as a dino, trying to fill as many tables with food as possible, while also avoiding and feeding angry dinos! 

This was made for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022". The theme was "Heal". I thought that giving monsters food instead of killing them was sort of a way to implement the "Heal" theme. 

WASD to move. Left click to pick up and place food, and right click to feed dinos while holding food. 

Play in full screen mode if you can - I find the little window cuts off the top of the screen.
